children.text: Hi, and thank you for taking a few minutes to support Therapair — a non-profit initiative by Unison Mental Health.
We're developing a system that helps people find the right therapist through personality, values, and lived experience alignment.
You may have seen our basic sandbox demo—it's just a starting point. We need to make the questions much more sophisticated to create truly personalised connections.
This short 5–7 minute survey explores:
What questions matter most for matching
What level of personalisation feels right
What options resonate most
What's your profession?
Please specify your profession:

labels.placeholder: e.g., Art Therapist, Play Therapist, etc.

children.text: How many years have you been practising?
What type of clients do you primarily support?
(Select all that apply)
Please specify other client types:
What therapy modalities do you mainly use?
(Select all that apply)
Please specify other modalities:
How do clients usually find you?
(Select all that apply)
Please specify other methods:

labels.placeholder: e.g., Social media, Professional networks, etc.

children.text: In your view, what makes a great match between client and therapist?
(Select all that apply)
Please specify other factors:
What's the biggest frustration or gap in existing referral or directory systems?
(Select all that apply)
Please specify other gaps:

labels.placeholder: e.g., Lack of transparency, Poor user experience, etc.

children.text: Do you currently screen clients for fit before working together?
Our current sandbox demo has basic questions. To create deeper personalisation, we're considering questions about:
Communication style (direct vs. gentle, structured vs. exploratory)
Therapeutic relationship preferences (collaborative, directive, etc.)
Personality traits (introversion, openness, etc.)
Lived experience (trauma, identity, culture)
Values and beliefs
Work style and boundaries
Which of these question types matter most for creating deep personalisation?
(Select all that apply)
Would you be open to sharing aspects of your personality, communication style, or lived experience to help clients find a better fit?
Which aspects feel too personal or unnecessary to share?
(Select all that apply)
How detailed do you think a therapist profile should be for accurate matching?
(1 = Very simple, 5 = Very detailed)
How long would you consider reasonable for an onboarding profile questionnaire?
Would you trust an AI system to pre-match clients based on personality and values if transparent and privacy-compliant?
Would you like a free one-year listing when Therapair launches publicly?
Thank you for taking part in shaping the future of meaningful therapy connections.
You can explore the sandbox demo anytime:
